title: Looking For An Backup Adc For My Ranked Team - Plat ++
body:
We will be rotating through our starting players and our backups to make sure we have the best team we can get!
If you want to join you will have to apply on this by filling these in.
Summoner Name:
Rank:
Age:
Skype:
First Name:
Preferred Role:
Champions Played In Said Role:

replies.body: Silkenfawn 19 adc only should be diamond 5 this weekend. Just want to sub since I have my own team,

Summoner Name: whitepumah
Rank: gold 5
Age: 22
Skype: whitepumah
First Name: David
Preferred Role: ADC
Champions Played In Said Role: All

Rank: G2
